B2 an angry disagreement between two or more people or groups: They had a bitter quarrel about/over some money three years ago and they haven't spoken to each other since. We have no quarrel with the people of your country (= we have no reason to disagree with or dislike them). They seem to have patched up their quarrel (= finished their disagreement and started to be friendly). Synonyms
argument (DISAGREEMENT)
disagreement
dispute
row (ARGUMENT) mainly UK
run-in (ARGUMENT) informal
